name: DownFall (itch) (PaperMoon Studio, Nolan Jutard, Batete01, El Mapache, AlexisCorsand, PMakary, Léo Nimsgern, William FILIPE, RYMBEY, PitiFlan, Amir1632, Wiloux, delaterriere, itaruf, KarimBallan, NaNda_sbr)
name_original: DownFall (itch) (PaperMoon Studio, Nolan Jutard, Batete01, El Mapache, AlexisCorsand, PMakary, Léo Nimsgern, William FILIPE, RYMBEY, PitiFlan, Amir1632, Wiloux, delaterriere, itaruf, KarimBallan, NaNda_sbr)
description:
Hello, Paper Moon here, a team of 18 students from IIM and AudioWorshop.
We create this project in 6 months during our studies. 

DownFall is a game combining parkour and gliding in a floating island world. You play as Nayah, an orphan girl traveling the world in search of the answer to her existence. Run, jump on the wall and glide to discover all the secrets of this world. 

Prod : Adnan ESBER, Pierre ARVIS, Arthur TERRIER

GD : Amir ALOTOUNOU, Karim BALLAN, William FILIPE

Prog : Benjamin CHARIOU, Imane TARUF, Léo NIMSGERN, Nolan JUTARD,

Wilhelm THOMASEAU

Art : Abdelbari BERRIM, Paul MAKARY, Theo BALICOUR

SD : Alexis CORSAND, Jules VICTOR

Compositor : Ludovic ANDRI, Thibault CASANO

Samuel CHOLVIN for the Trailer

Misele Hoang for the voice of Nayah

All our professor, 

Music used in the game : Drive

Press kit and contact : Drive
